text: 1.13-14 1 Ti 4.7, 2 Ti 4.2, 4.4, Tat 2.2 Takaw gos nɨgep agak anɨb ak, nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agak. Anɨb ak kɨli anɨgɨpal okok, nad kɨlop tɨmud wukɨl kɨles gɨl agɨnɨmɨn. Agenɨmɨn, bɨ Juda kesɨm yokɨp apal okok sek, takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ak kelɨgɨl takaw kɨles adek apal okok sek, ma nɨŋɨd dɨnɨgel. Pen takaw yɨpɨd gɨl ak dɨlɨg, Klays nop gos lɨnɨgɨnɨgel.
